message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can work out a more even split later if you're willing to play along.
My turn for the lion's share. This is a time-sensitive negotiation, let's not waste rounds.
Let's try to be a bit more reasonable. I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I need a good amount to make it worthwhile for me.  How about we split it more evenly?
Time is money, Alice!  This is a good deal, take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
